author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Further follow-up to #44925, which was already following up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44914, in order to fix the issue reported at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44925#issuecomment-2100759773.
This is necessary because in order to modify the instance of `SiPixelStatusProducer` in `TIER0RAWSIPIXELCAL`, configured as 

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/2169b5684eb29db8aa2e60eded3eedfc3479df80/CalibTracker/SiPixelQuality/python/SiPixelStatusProducer_cfi.py#L3-L8

to fetch the right input collection `siPixelClusters::ALCARECO` (as `ALCARECO` is the `process` name now, to match the one use by the subsequent step `ALCASPLITSIPIXELCAL`)

#### PR validation:

` runTheMatrix.py -l 1040,1040.1 -t 4 -j 8 --ibeos` runs fine. Also the are no more warnings.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, will be backported at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44918
title: change input `siPixelClusters` collection for 1040.0 wf step2
